original: ḍākārṇavaḥ I śṛṇu śṛṇu bodhiṁ prapañcagataṁ,
analyzed: ḍākārṇavaḥ i śṛṇu śṛṇu bodhi prapañcagata

original: (p1-2) II iha hi na bhāvo'bhāvo na rāgo virāgaḥ saṁnasyatyatra punārajya |
analyzed: iha hi na bhāvaḥ bhāvaḥ na rāgaḥ virāgaḥ

original: madhyasthite'tra dharme na rajya rajya vajre'bhinnadharme pramodasva ||
analyzed: madhya sthita itra dharme na rajya rajya vajrebhinna dharme pramodasva

original: (p3-4) III dharmadharmau yatra astaṁ gatau tatra tvaṁ badhnāsi bodhau manaḥ |
analyzed: dharmadharmau yatra asta gatau tatra tva badhnāsi bodhau manaḥ

original: siddhaḥ surāsuraḥ sa hi bhavati truṭyatyāyātigatī nijānām ||
analyzed: siddhaḥ sura asuraḥ sa hi bhavati truṭyati āyāti gatī nijānām

original: uttiṣṭhatu śvāso galaparyantaṁ ha tribhuvanadīpopamo yathā ||
analyzed: uttiṣṭhatu śvāsaḥ gala paryanta ha tribhuvana dīpa upamaḥ yathā

original: binduśobhano hi mantra itaro mantra iti bhaṇa janayati yoginīm ||
analyzed: bindu śobhanaḥ hi mantraḥ itaraḥ mantraḥ iti bhaṇa janayati yoginīm

original: (p7-9) punardvayaṁ bhanitaṁ bhavati dhyānaṁ māraṇaṁ jīvanaṁ dānaṁ hi |
analyzed: punardvaya bhanita bhavati dhyāna māraṇa jīvana dāna hi
vāhana mahā bodhi mārgasya idam śūkarī bījam
ākāra karṇa ābharaṇa ṣoḍaśa kalā arddha sthita ravi ābharaṇam
tila sahita dīpyamāna ānandaḥ caturthaḥ hi

original: (p12-13) ya-sya vargasyāntaṁ hi sukharūpam u-svara-saṁrohaṇa- yuktakaṁ candrabinduḥ (tasya)
analyzed: yasya sukha rūpam candra binduḥ tasya

original: śīrṣe lagno jvāla- yatu ca divasaṁ hi |
analyzed: śīrṣe lagnaḥ jvāla yatu ca hi

original: sa-parākṣaram anāho ravyāsanasaṁsthitaṁ caturthasvaragrahaḥ karṇadeśo bhavatu,
analyzed: sa para akṣaram caturtha svara grahaḥ karṇa deśaḥ bhavatu
kalā arddhacandra bindunā bhūṣita mastaka rāgasya antaḥ svabhāvaḥ

original: (p16-18) V ādisthitirvairocanaḥ svabhāvo dharmadhātuḥ kāryasya rūpaṁ hi |
analyzed: ādi sthitiḥ vairocanaḥ svabhāvaḥ dharmadhātuḥ kāryasya hi
ta varga sa sthita pañcama akṣara

original: pa-(varga)- syāntaṁ bījam au-svarayuktakaṁ mohanāśanaṁ hi yoginīvṛndaṁ sphurati ca |
analyzed: bījam hi yoginī vṛnda sphurati ca

original: tasya punarvargasya bījaṁ caturthaṁ tribhuvanaṁ vyāpnoti yoginīviśrayaḥ ||
analyzed: tasya punarvargasya bīja caturtha tribhuvana vyāpnoti yoginī viśrayaḥ
jalasya akṣaram sañcita sarvasya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ

original: i-svarako lagati śīrṣe sadā brahmasvabhāvo dṛśyate |
analyzed: isvarakaḥ lagati śīrṣe sadā brahma svabhāvaḥ dṛśyate
yuktaka a svaraḥ punar iravaḥ i svara yuktaḥ
asvara yukta duṣṭa sattva kāraṇa bhavatu
jakāraḥ parigṛhya isvara māyā bhāva sa yuktaḥ

original: (p27-28) dantasya bījam e-svaroha lagati karṇe bhinnam uragamantro'daḥ (bījam) |
analyzed: dantasya bījam lagati karṇe bhinnam uragamantrodaḥ bījam
laḥ ca yuktakaḥ lokasya ādhāraḥ bodheḥ kāraṇa dharmaḥ
i svara yuktaka ya vargasya antam tena
sa param ekāra yuktaka hetuḥ tribhuvana bhrānte
ya vargasya anta hi padma akṣara bījam
sya ma sta sthitam ekāraḥ tasya pare lagatu

original: evaṁ mantraṣaṭpadaṁ hi yoginīvṛndañca sarvakarmasvarūpaṁ cakram |

analyzed: vi ya vargasya anta hi bījam
dvi jihvā rekhā yuktaḥ ca yoginī mantraḥ
ādhi sthitaḥ svaraḥ prathama guṇa nāthaḥ
dvi jihvāḥ i svaraḥ maste lagatu
śūnyasya bhūṣitam ca śukra dhātavaḥ ca

original: (p41) ya-vargasya dvitīyaṁ bījam i-svara-yuktañca vajrasyāgnisthito nāthaḥ |
analyzed: bījam isvara yuktam ca vajrasya agni sthitaḥ nāthaḥ
eka āra ābharaṇa yoni su maṇḍitam ca
ta kāraḥ ravi yuktaḥ ca jvarasya dhvasarājaḥ

original: bha-(kāraḥ) raviyuktaśca e-kāra-maṇḍitaśca nābheḥ kuṇḍe sthitaḥ |
analyzed: bhakāraḥ ravi yuktaḥ ca ekāra maṇḍitaḥ ca nābheḥ kuṇḍe sthitaḥ
viśoṣaṇīya mantraḥ yathā catur ānanda svarūpa mahā nidhi bījam
ṇikāraḥ sva rūpeṇa gṛhītaḥ ca yoginī tattva svarūpam
kara asa yoga hi akṣara dūra nāḍī rasasya

original: gṛhītvā yoginīvṛndakam aṣṭapadaṁ sādhanāyā eva rūpam |
analyzed: gṛhītvā yoginī vṛndakam aṣṭapada sādhanāyāḥ eva rūpam
tavarga sya antam ikāra bhūṣitam ca kapālasya madhyanāḍī rūpam
gṛhītam ca karma kṣayati tat ca
pārthiva bījam hi trikoṇasya madhye tiṣṭhati
ṭavargasya ante bīje i y u ktaḥ ca
eva daśa pada mantraḥ caturyugasya pramāthī sarvaḥ
pakāraḥ prapañca sahitaḥ ca rakāraḥ i sahitaḥ yoginīcakravān

original: ya-vargasyāntamiti tṛtīyasvareṇa śirasi bhūṣitañca viśvasya mantrasya jñāna-svarūpam |
analyzed: ya vargasya antam iti tṛtīya svareṇa śirasi bhūṣitam ca viśvasya mantrasya jñāna svarūpam

original: i-kāro muṇḍe lagatu mokṣarūpam ajñānasya viśvasya |
analyzed: ikāraḥ muṇḍe lagatu mokṣa rūpam ajñānasya viśvasya

original: (p 60) punaḥ pavanasyāntaṁ hi a-kāraḥ ojojāto brahmaṇo rūpaṁ padmañca |
analyzed: punar pavanasya anta hi akāraḥ ojaḥ jātaḥ brahmaṇaḥ
mukuṭa maṇḍitaḥ ca sahaja rūpaka svabhāvaḥ hi
śirasaḥ bhūṣitam ca tattvaka itara svarūpam
pavargasya anta hi sakalasya māyā svabhāvaḥ
antar stha bījasya antaḥ ca śukra vāyu abhinnam
jaṭitam ca sidhyat māyāvat rūpam ca
tasya pārśva bījam ekāra karṇa ābharaṇa sañcalam ekalam
nava padam iti yoginī vṛndasya akṣaraka mantra svarūpa traidhātukam

original: (66) VIII ta-mantro hi dvisaṁyogaḥ pa-sthiti agni-pavana-bījaṁ mahāsukha-rāgaḥ |

analyzed: ca yoga hi akṣara pavana svabhāva strīṇi
ta akṣaram ca ayuta punarvijñānasya bījam
punar api padam iti upāya abhinnam
na mantraḥ punar api bhaṇitam padam
kākana sthitaḥ ca tṛtīya svaraḥ tṛtīye bhavati
punar ca mantra pada dvis bhaṇitavya sakala vitarka naṣṭakam ca
yavarṇaḥ mantraḥ hi vajra randhrasya śobhā

original: ha-āsanasthitam e-kāra-karṇābharaṇaṁ ḍākinī-mantraśca avarodhanaṁ sarva iti |

analyzed: kavarga dvitīya bīja yoginī jana tattvam
ṭa akṣaram a svara mukuṭa maṇḍitam ca
rasya antakam akāra pūrttakam ca agni jvālā īśānakam
a svareṇa bhūṣitam ca bhava rahita rūpam

original: ṭa-syāntaṁ hi gṛhītaṁ bījaṁ tṛtīya-svareṇa śirasi bhūṣitañca (tatprabhāveṇa)
ma-dvayaṁ hā-dvayaṁ bhaṇitavyaṁ hara hara iti moha-svabhāvaḥ |
analyzed: madvaya hādvaya bhaṇitavya hara hara iti moha svabhāvaḥ
sakāraḥ dvitīya svaraḥ ca sahita cārī

original: ta-syāntaṁ hi akṣaram i-yuktakaṁ niḥsvābhāvaḥ sarvaḥ |

analyzed: a svara pūrṇīkṛta manasaḥ duṣṭasya mahā grahaṇam
hi dvi akṣara bhuvana mantraḥ bhīṣaṇaḥ

original: ya-antaṁ hi dastraṁ kramikañca jñānaṁ pavitram |
analyzed: yaanta hi dastra kramikañca jñāna pavitram

original: (84-85) na-mantro hi tṛtīyasvareṇa śirasi bhūṣitaśca nivartitaṁ dharmādharma-svarūpam |
analyzed: na mantraḥ hi tṛtīya svareṇa śirasi bhūṣitaḥ ca dharma adharma svarūpam
gṛhītam ca nagaram iva bhāti abhāvaḥ
sakāraḥ isvara bhinnakaḥ ca siha mahiṣaka nāśaḥ

original: evaṁ padāni caturdaśa hi mārakaḥ sarvasattvasyājñānasya |
analyzed: eva padāni caturdaśa hi mārakaḥ sarva sattvasya ajñānasya

original: (88) X ka-madhya-bījaṁ ra-āsanam agra eva yāpanadharmaḥ |

analyzed: tasya dvitīya akṣaram i svara yuktam ca tena
tathā sumbhe mantraḥ yoginī pūjā svarūpam

original: ṇa-a-aṁ pūrṇamevaṁ bījaṁ hi guṇasya hi mantraḥ |
analyzed: pūrṇam eva hi guṇasya hi mantraḥ
bodhiḥ na kalpyate kutra api tatra
kromantraḥ ākramaḥ sa sāra chettā ca

original: dha-bījaṁ dalanaṁ sarvasya hi sattvasya hi niṣprapañcam |

analyzed: eva saha catuṣpadī mantraḥ cakranāḍikā utpatti ityādiḥ
jayī jayī yadā ca karma kumbhaḥ

original: (97-98) XI ti-mantro hi sahaja-svarūpam upakarmaviśeṣo hi sarvacakram |
analyzed: ti mantraḥ hi sahaja svarūpam upakarma viśeṣaḥ hi sarva cakram
śrī heruka devasya agra mahiṣi mantra pada ghrāṇa svarūpam
śabda viṣayaḥ ca śabdasya svara patiḥ

original: evaṁ mantra-pada-saptakam arddhena miśritaṁ sarvasya maraṇaṁ rūpaṁ januḥ |
analyzed: eva mantra pada saptakam arddhena miśrita sarvasya maraṇa rūpa januḥ

original: kha-dvayaṁ dhu-dvayaṁ muru-dvayaṁ karmaṇo bhāvaśca prāṇaiḥ samastham |

analyzed: krodha daśaka akṣarāṇi yama ādi boddhavyam
eva hi preta sattva pada lagnam
bhaṇitavyam sapta akṣarāṇi svatva dhātuḥ hi carma ādiḥ
trailokya nāśani iti mantraḥ duṣṭaka vācikaḥ hi
śata sahasra eka koṭi tathāgata parivārite mantraḥ

original: evam upasamāhāryo mantraḥ sakalo hi ha-ū-aṁ-mantra-svabhāvo hi |
analyzed: evam upasamāhāryaḥ mantraḥ sakalaḥ hi haūa mantra svabhāvaḥ hi
eva mantra padāni catvāri yoginī utpatti jāta siddhiḥ

original: (111-112) XV punarhi sa-paraṁ pañcasvarapārśvasthitāsanaṁ khaṇḍendubindubhūṣaṇaṁ vidhinā tattvabījam |
analyzed: punar hi sapara pañca svara pārśva sthita āsana khaṇḍa indu bindu bhūṣaṇa vidhinā tattva bījam
siha rūpe khaḥ mantra pada vināyaka vidhvasanam iti
gaja rūpe gaḥ mantraḥ sattva vighna karaḥ ca
dvaya pada mantraḥ sāgaramekhalā mantraka mekhalā
praketa utpattiḥ yathā yogaḥ ca vijñātavyam
eva sapta pada mantraḥ sarva karmaka loka jñāna bhūma utpattiḥ manaḥ jahāti
huhā dvaya mahāpaśu moha nipada sa sāraḥ ca
eva sapta mantra pada bhinnaka karma karoti

original: (118) XVII pa-(kāra)- syāntaṁ sa-param a-yuktaṁ hi ya- (kāra)
analyzed: pakāra syānta saparam hi ya kāra
sya antam ī svara yuktam ca
sya anta siddhepada vidyepada mśvari mantraḥ

original: (119) pa-pārśvasthitaḥ ṭa-kāro huṁ phaṭkāraḥ svāhayā saha ca |
analyzed: papārśva sthitaḥ ṭakāraḥ hu phaṭkāraḥ svāhayā saha ca

original: evaṁ mantro nābhisthito vidhinā svadhā-nāmnā saha kathitaḥ |
analyzed: eva mantraḥ na abhisthitaḥ vidhinā svadhā nāmnā saha kathitaḥ
na bhujaḥ na hi sa sthāna ādiḥ bhavati

original: sarvaṁ prapañcaṁ bhāvena gṛhītvā ca chardaya mohaṁ paramārthaṁ praviśa |
analyzed: sarva prapañca bhāvena gṛhītvā ca chardaya moha paramārtha praviśa
ramasva ramasva parama mahā sukha vajre

original: lokānāṁ karuṇāṁ bhāvaya tvaṁ sakalasurāsureṣu baddho hi yathā |
analyzed: lokānā karuṇāḥ bhāvaya tva sakala sura asureṣu baddhaḥ hi yathā
ārādhitaḥ mahā sukhena bodhi vajra dharaḥ hi

original: rāmaya vajraṁ padme adya hi nibodhasi yena saha śūnyasamādhau asi tvam |
analyzed: rāmaya vajra padme adya hi nibodhasi yena saha śūnyasamādhau asi tvam
jvālaya tva prabho catur dhātu bījam
tribhuvana dahyate na dṛśyate kaḥ api

original: imaṁ bodhaṁ kuru citta jinanāthasya sattvadhātumuttāraya māyāyāḥ |
analyzed: bodha kuru citta jinanāthasya sattvadhātum uttāraya māyāyāḥ

original: yoginītattve sarvasāre yo hi sa naro vajradharaḥ |
analyzed: yoginītattve sarva sāre yaḥ hi sa naraḥ vajradharaḥ

original: (128) XXI śruṇu śruṇu tvaṁ bhagini hi,

analyzed: punar sa sārasya duḥkha na bhavati

original: yaḥ paśuḥ sa hi buddhastu janaḥ |
analyzed: yaḥ paśuḥ sa hi buddhaḥ tu janaḥ
tatra ajara amara prāpsyasi punar hi
bandhaḥ hi gama āgamaḥ na bhavati

original: vikasitaṁ padmaṁ kāmayasva mama tathā lokaṁ sarvaṁ sukhayen ||
analyzed: vikasita padma kāmayasva mama tathā loka sarva sukhayen
kāraṇa sarva dharmasya tva hi kaḥ stvam

original: vividharūpaṁ yasya kuru praghnan tribhuvane maṇḍalacakraṁ sphurat ||
analyzed: vividha rūpa yasya kuru praghnan tribhuvane maṇḍala cakra sphurat

original: ari ri ri mohapaśuloko na yāti |
analyzed: ari ri ri moha paśu lokaḥ na yāti
sahaja sundarī gṛhītvā mahā sukhe tiṣṭhati
tribhuvane sakalaḥ hi janaḥ buddha svabhāvaḥ
ari yaḥ tva parama artha na bhāvayasi

original: tat tvaṁ sa hi buddhatvaṁ na prāpsyasi ||
analyzed: tat tva sa hi buddhatva na prāpsyasi
antar bahis eva abhin hi jānīhi
nama sura asura tribhuvana nātha hi

original: īndriyaloko na jānāti kutra paramamahāsukhaṁ pūjaya gāthayā ||
analyzed: īndriya lokaḥ na jānāti kutra parama mahā sukha pūjaya gāthayā
